page.title: 03Building Development
page.content: In Gauldry three building companies and the Council are building houses. The building companies are Betts, Interbuild and Frasers.Approximately forty_five houses are in the Betts complex,thirty houses in the Interbuild complex,fifteen houses in the Frasers complex,and the Council have not started building yet.Some people are objecting to the Council houses being built,and are saying they would move out,rather than let the houses be built while they live in Gauldry.The village used to be small, but it has grown considerably in the last ten years.In recent years many farm_workers cottages have been bought by private buyers and renovated. by Philip Stevenson. --------------------
